Html:
Hello,

I received the following error. I tried to insert FK in OrderDetail to resolve the issue but issue persists.. Any idea?

 

System.InvalidOperationException was unhandled by user code
  HResult=-2146233079
  Message=The entity types 'Artist' and 'OrderDetail' cannot share table 'OrderDetail' because they are not in the same type hierarchy or do not have a valid one to one foreign key relationship with matching primary keys between them.

Can you provide some of your models? I suspect thats where the problem is given the error that you are getting. Album.cs, Artist.cs and OrderDetail.cs would be useful to see. As far as I can tell there is no commonality between Artist and OrderDetail so the error doesnt make a lot of sense so unless its picking up the link via the Album class then i cant see what might be wrong but as I say, your code would be useful here
